content.raw:
Hi @Kent0219 , thank you for the crash report. 

The summary you posted doesn't give any clues as to why Gazebo crashed though. Could you add more information here, such as the versions of Gazebo and ROS you're using, how you installed them, what's the content of the log files mentioned above, whether you're able to run Gazebo with the `gazebo` command (as opposed to `roslaunch`).
content.html:
Hi @Kent0219 , thank you for the crash report.

The summary you posted doesn't give any clues as to why Gazebo crashed though. Could you add more information here, such as the versions of Gazebo and ROS you're using, how you installed them, what's the content of the log files mentioned above, whether you're able to run Gazebo with the gazebo command (as opposed to roslaunch).
